title: Full-size Washer and Dryer Connections, Two-Inch Wood-Style Blinds*
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 910 Sq.
Join the apartment life at 8181 Med Center, a Houston home near the Downtown area.
With studio, one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments available, all luxuriantly finished, 8181 is ready to lease you your preferred floor plan today.

Shared spaces account for daily needs and priorities at every stage, as our community amenities were procured for exercise on your schedule, evening cookouts, personal convenience, poolside recreation, and movie screenings, as well.

Kitchen Faucet with Sprayer*, Full-size Washer and Dryer Connections, Lighted Ceiling Fans*, Private Patio/Balcony, Two-Inch Wood-Style Blinds*, Breakfast Bar*, Digital Thermostats*, Linen Closets, Kitchen Pantry, Undermount Kitchen Sink*, Granite Countertops*, Ceilings Fans*, Upgraded Lighting Fixtures*, USB Port in Kitchen*, Brushed Nickel Cabinet Hardware*, Storage Closet, Subway Tile Backsplash, Plush Bedroom Carpeting*, Central Heating and Air, Wood-style Flooring*, GE Stainless-steel Appliances Including Dishwasher*, Ideal Location in the Heart of The Medical Center, Designer-selected Paint Finishings*, Open-Concept Chef's Kitchen, Walk-In Closets

Located Across from the Leasing Center, Sundeck with Gazebo, Resident Business Center, Covered Parking/Garages Available, Barbecue and Picnic Areas, Extra Storage Available, Clothes Care Center, Wi-Fi in Clubhouse and Pool Area, Gated Access Community, Two Swimming Pools and a Wading Pool, State-of-the-Art-24-Hour Fitness Center, 24/7 Emergency Maintenance Services
